steps.title: Assemble Table Frame
steps.description: Attach the mounting brackets to the side rails and position under the tabletop.

steps.title: Add Corner Blocks
steps.description: Insert the 4 corner mounting blocks into the frame corners by rotating them into place.

steps.title: Add Cross Support Bars
steps.description: Attach 4 cross support bars between the side rails to complete the frame structure.

steps.title: Attach Table Legs
steps.description: Attach the four table legs to the corner blocks at each corner of the frame.

steps.title: Attach Plastic Feet
steps.description: Attach the plastic feet to the bottom of each leg to protect the floor.

steps.title: Attach Cable Management Hooks
steps.description: Insert 4 cable management hooks into the slots on the underside of the table and rotate them to lock in place.

steps.title: Attach Legs
steps.description: Attach the legs to the table frame using bolts, washers and a wrench.

steps.title: Attach Cable Management Hooks
steps.description: Insert 4 cable management hooks into the slots on the underside of the table and rotate them to lock in place.

steps.title: Attach Brackets
steps.description: Attach the brackets to the underside of the table using screws and tighten with the Allen key.

steps.title: Adjust Leg Height
steps.description: Adjust the height of each leg by rotating the foot piece to ensure the table is level on the floor.

steps.title: Attach Support Brackets
steps.description: Attach the support brackets to the table frame using screws, washers, and the Allen key, ensuring the bracket orientation matches the diagram.

steps.title: Attach Brackets
steps.description: Attach the brackets to the table frame using a screw and tighten with the Allen key.
